metadata.title: CVE-2022-3311 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in import in Google Chrome prior to 106.0.5249.62 allowed aremote attacker who had compromised a WebUI process to potentially performa sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
